fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Factional chat
- No factional kill (presumably)
- The Crew's presence does not stop the game from ending unless it is the only evil faction opposing a good one.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all main factions. (The Crew can win with all Neutrals.)

meta.inherit_fields: Goal: Kill all main factions. (The Crew can win with all Neutrals.)
